zh-tw.enter_start_end_same_time: 請同時輸入開始與結束時間
zh-tw.release_must_enter_open_interval: 發佈必須輸入開放區間
zh-tw.start_date_can_not_after_end_date: 開始時間不可大於結束時間
zh-tw.start_date_can_not_equal_end_date: 開始時間不可等於結束時間
zh-tw.repeat_activity_error: 與下列活動計息時間重複
zh-tw.create_activity_msg_2:
簡易版：同一開放區間最多可設定10筆活動
不限定須完全重複的時間，只要兩個活動的時間有重疊到就算
zh-tw.create_activity_msg_3: 新增活動：不同版本「利息設定」活動計息時間不可重複，在當前所有活動「結束計息」後即可建立。例如：若Ａ活動(簡易版)提前於2/3 10:30 結束計息，則Ｂ活動(進階版)即可從2/3 11:00 開始建立
zh-tw.create_activity_msg_1: 本利金額將於結息後10日由系統自動派發
zh-tw.at_least_choose_one_rank_category: 請至少選擇一等級類別

zh-cn.enter_start_end_same_time: 请同时输入开始与结束时间
zh-cn.release_must_enter_open_interval: 发布必须输入开放区间
zh-cn.start_date_can_not_after_end_date: 开始时间不可大于结束时间
zh-cn.start_date_can_not_equal_end_date: 开始时间不可等于结束时间
zh-cn.repeat_activity_error: 与下列活动计息时间重复
zh-cn.create_activity_msg_2:
简易版：同一开放区间最多可设定10笔活动
不限定须完全重复的时间，只要两个活动的时间有重叠到就算
zh-cn.create_activity_msg_3: 新增活动：不同版本「利息设定」活动计息时间不可重复，在当前所有活动「结束计息」后即可建立。例如：若Ａ活动(简易版)提前于2/3 10:30 结束计息，则Ｂ活动(进阶版)即可从2/3 11:00 开始建立
zh-cn.create_activity_msg_1: 本利金额将于结息后10日由系统自动派发
zh-cn.at_least_choose_one_rank_category: 请至少选择一等级类别

en.input_level_name_to_filter: or fill in the level name
en.zh_cn_activity_must: The Simplified Chinese event name is required.
en.at_least_choose_one_level: Please choose at least one level.
en.at_least_choose_one_currency: Please choose at least one currency.
en.confirm_temporary_activity: Do you want to temporarily save the event?
en.confirm_release_activity: Do you want to publish the event?
en.complete_activity_setting: Please complete the event settings first.
en.enter_start_end_same_time: Please enter the start and end time together.
en.release_must_enter_open_interval: The event period is required when publish the event.
en.start_date_can_not_after_end_date: The start time cannot be later than the end time.
en.start_date_can_not_equal_end_date: The start time cannot be equal to the end time.
en.following_currency_not_open: The below currencies are not allowed.
en.repeat_activity_error: The calculation time is the same as the following events.
en.create_activity_msg_2:
Simple Version: Up to 10 events can be set in the same open period.
The time doesn’t need to be exactly the same, as long as the time of the two events overlap.
en.create_activity_msg_3: Add Event: The calculation time of the different version of “interest settings” cannot be repeated. The new event can be created after all current events “end calculation”.Example: If Event A (Simple Version) ends calculation at 10:30 on 2/3, Event B (Advanced Version) can be created at 11:00 on 2/3.
en.create_activity_msg_1: rinciple and interest will be automatically paid by system 10 days after the settlement.
en.at_least_choose_one_rank: Please choose at least one VIP Level.
en.at_least_choose_one_rank_category: Please choose at least one type of VIP Level.
en.this_rank_category_has_been_deleted: The type of VIP Level does not exist.

ja.create_activity_msg_3: Add Event: The calculation time of the different version of “interest settings” cannot be repeated. The new event can be created after all current events “end calculation”.Example: If Event A (Simple Version) ends calculation at 10:30 on 2/3, Event B (Advanced Version) can be created at 11:00 on 2/3.

ko.enter_start_end_same_time: 시작 및 끝나는 시간을 동시 입력하세요
ko.release_must_enter_open_interval: 오픈 구간을 입력하셔야 올리실 수 있습니다
ko.start_date_can_not_equal_end_date: 시작하는 시간과 끝나는 시간이 달라야 합니다
ko.create_activity_msg_2: 기초 버전 : 동일 오픈 구간에 최대 10건의 이벤트를 설정 가능. 동일 기간의 설정은 제한되지 않으며 둘 이벤트의 기간이 겹치기만 하면 됨.
ko.create_activity_msg_3: 이벤트 추가 : 서로 다른 버전인 「이자 설정」의 이벤트 이자 계산 시간은 중복되어서는 안 되며 현재 모든 이벤트가 「이자 계산 종료」한 후에 작성될 수 있습니다.예 : A 이벤트(기초 버전)가 2/3 10:30로 앞당기어 이자 계산 종료되면 B 이벤트(업그레이드 버전)는 2/3 11:00부터 작성될 수 있습니다.
ko.create_activity_msg_1: 본금과 이자금액은 정산 후 10일내 시스템 자동 발급됩니다.
ko.this_rank_category_has_been_deleted: The type of VIP Level does not exist.

vi.following_currency_not_open: Các loại tiền tệ bên dưới chưa được mở
vi.repeat_activity_error: Thời gian tính tiền lãi trùng với khuyến mãi dưới đây
vi.create_activity_msg_2:
Bản thường: Cùng lúc có thể cài đặt nhiều nhất 10 món khuyến mãi.
Không nhất định là phải hoàn toàn cùng thời điểm, chỉ cần thời gian 2 khuyến mãi trùng nhau là được
vi.create_activity_msg_3: Tạo mới khuyến mãi: không cùng phiên bản 「cài đặt tiền lãi」thì thời gian tính tiền lãi không thể trùng lặp, sau 「kết thúc thời gian tính tiền lãi」của tất cả những hoạt động trước đó thì có thể thiết lập.Ví dụ: Nếu hoạt động A ( bản đơn giản) kết thúc trước thời gian tính tiền lãi vào lúc 10:30 3/2, thì hoạt động B (bản nâng cấp) thì có thể bắt đầu thiết lập từ 11:00 3/2.
vi.create_activity_msg_1: Tiền gửi và lãi sẽ được hệ thông tự động phát sau khi kết thúc tính lãi 10 ngày

th.create_activity_msg_2:
เวอร์ชั่นย่อ：เปิดให้ตั้งค่ากิจกรรมในโซนเปิดมากสุด10กิจกรรม
ไม่จำกัดว่าเวลาต้องซ้ำ เพียงเเค่มีสองกิจกรรมที่เวลาซ้อนกันก็ได้
th.create_activity_msg_3: เพิ่มกิจกรรม：ห้ามไม่ให้ผู้เล่นจับเวลากิจกรรมซ้ำในการ「ตั้งค่าดอกเบี้ย」ของเกมส์เวอร์ชั่นต่างๆ โดยสามารถตั้งค่าใหม่ได้เมื่อ「สิ้นสุดการคำนวณดอกเบี้ย」เช่น：หากกิจกรรมＡ(เวอร์ชั่นย่อ)สิ้นสุดการคำนวณดอกเบี้ยก่อนในวันที่ 3ก.พ. เวลา10:30น. ก็จะสามารถตั้งกิจกรรมＢ(เวอร์ชั่นเต็ม)ได้ตั้งเเต่วันที่ 3ก.พ. เวลา11:00น.เป็นต้นไป
